history.proof: intros T U F G HF. unfold filterlim. unfold filter_le. intros P HGP. unfold filtermap. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

original: intros T U F G HF. unfold filterlim. unfold filter_le. intros P HGP. unfold filtermap. unfold filter_prod. simpl. exists (fun x => let (a, b) := x in P (snd x) /\ G (fun y => fst x = a /\ y = b)). split. - apply filter_prod_filter; auto. - intros. apply HGP. apply H0.
